name: King Ramkhamhaeng the Great
role: King and creator of the Thai alphabet
what_did:
King Ramkhamhaeng ruled the Sukhothai Kingdom and helped it grow strong and peaceful.
He invented the Thai writing system and encouraged learning, religion, and trade.
He welcomed people from different places and let them live freely.
why_matters:
He helped shape Thai culture by creating the Thai alphabet.
His leadership is remembered as a golden time in Thai history, with freedom and growth.
